transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: how can I replace my batteries

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can help you with that. To replace your batteries, you can simply visit any of our 500+ Battery Smart swap stations across India. The process is quick and easy, taking about 30 seconds. Just pull into a station, and our staff will assist you in swapping out your old battery for a new, fully charged one. You can find the nearest station using our Battery Smart app, which also shows real-time battery availability. Would you like me to guide you on how to use the app to find a station near you?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: no actually I want to know about the cost of swapping batteries

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We have over 500 swap stations across India! You can find the nearest one using the Battery Smart app. Swapping takes just 30 seconds.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: and what is the cost of swapping batteries

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We have over 500 swap stations across India! You can find the nearest one using the Battery Smart app. Swapping takes just 30 seconds.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: how can I replace my batteries

Agent: I can help you with that. To replace your batteries, you can simply visit any of our 500+ Battery Smart swap stations across India. The process is quick and easy, taking about 30 seconds. Just pull into a station, and our staff will assist you in swapping out your old battery for a new, fully charged one. You can find the nearest station using our Battery Smart app, which also shows real-time battery availability. Would you like me to guide you on how to use the app to find a station near you?

Customer: no actually I want to know about the cost of swapping batteries

Agent: We have over 500 swap stations across India! You can find the nearest one using the Battery Smart app. Swapping takes just 30 seconds.

Customer: and what is the cost of swapping batteries
